text: Loleni, viyatendile Mulungu kubitila kunyunyuwala kwenu, sambi mowamba ng'hani, modaha kulagusa kamba munoga. Mokona usungu mwahagona gehile gosang'hanwa, mosinhuka na kudumba, mosulukila ganogile, muilava kwa kusang'hana, molonda kona ganogile gotendeka. Kwa kila mbuli muilagusa mduhu gehile.
